SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class Enquiries

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.Enquiries
public class Enquiries extends Object
The Enquiries class Represents a collection of inquiries made by a specific enquirer.

      Retrieves a specific question based on its ID.

      Returns:
